info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued August 12 at 5:29PM EDT until August 12 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 635 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 5 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST GEORGIA FRANKLIN HABERSHAM HART RABUN STEPHENS IN NORTH CAROLINA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 17 COUNTIES IN WESTERN NORTH CAROLINA AVERY BUNCOMBE BURKE CALDWELL GRAHAM HAYWOOD HENDERSON JACKSON MACON MADISON MCDOWELL MITCHELL POLK RUTHERFORD SWAIN TRANSYLVANIA YANCEY IN SOUTH CAROLINA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 5 COUNTIES IN UPSTATE SOUTH CAROLINA ANDERSON GREENVILLE OCONEE PICKENS SPARTANBURG THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALARKA, ALLENSTAND, ALMOND, ANDERSON, ASHEVILLE, ASHFORD, BALDWIN, BANNER ELK, BEREA, BLACK MOUNTAIN, BOYDVILLE, BREVARD, BRYSON CITY, BURNSVILLE, BUSICK, CANDLER, CANON, CANTON, CEDAR MOUNTAIN, CELO, CLARKESVILLE, CLAYTON, CLEMSON, COLUMBUS, CORNELIA, COVE CREEK, CRUSO, CULLOWHEE, DACUSVILLE, DANA, DEMOREST, DYSARTSVILLE, EASLEY, EAST FLAT ROCK, ETOWAH, FAUST, FERO, FLETCHER, FOREST CITY, FORK SHOALS, FRANKLIN, FRANKLIN SPRINGS, GLENWOOD, GRANITE FALLS, GREENVILLE, GREER, GUMLOG, HARTWELL, HENDERSONVILLE, HIGHLANDS, HOLLYWOOD, HOT SPRINGS, INGALLS, KINGS CREEK, KYLE, LAVONIA, LENOIR, LITTLE RIVER, LUADA, LUCK, MARION, MARS HILL, MARSHALL, MAULDIN, MICAVILLE, MILL SPRING, MORGANTON, MOUNTAIN CITY, MOUNTAIN REST, NEBO, NEWLAND, NUBERG, OAKWAY, PATTERSON, PINE MOUNTAIN, PLEASANT GROVE, POPLAR, RAINBOW SPRINGS, RAMSEYTOWN, REED CREEK, ROBBINSVILLE, ROYSTON, RUTHERFORDTON, SALUDA, SAWMILLS, SENECA, SIMPSONVILLE, SPARTANBURG, SPINDALE, SPRUCE PINE, STECOAH, SUGAR HILL, SWISS, SYLVA, TAYLORS, TOCCOA, TRYON, TUCKASEGEE, TUXEDO, VALDESE, WALHALLA, WALNUT, WATERVILLE, WAYNESVILLE, WESSER, AND WESTMINSTER.
